alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:10PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Salt Lake...central Davis and east central Tooele Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 509 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Stansbury Park, or 15 miles west of West Valley City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Kaysville, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, Stansbury Park, West Bountiful, Salt Lake City International Airport, Magna, Emigration Canyon, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Fruit Heights, East Layton, Lake Point, Antelope Island State Park and University Of Utah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 306 and 330. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 91 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
